Name: Hyper Knights
About the game: Raise your army, learn powerful combos and take back your land! Slash and Dash your way through hundreds of enemies in the fast-paced skill-based action of Hyper Knights! Become stronger and learn new powerful combos to help you on your journey. Raise your army and recruit allied Knights to join your cause, command their armies, siege enemy castles, raid their outposts, ambush their convoys and use the loot to build your lands. Slash and Dash through your enemies Command hundreds of minions Recruit allied Knights to your cause Upgrade your skills and learn powerful combos Defend your lands from enemy attacks Duel enemy Knights Siege their castles and take back your land!
